column2: "One Force weapon of choice is the Talis. Let's just say it's a special weapon."
"You can place Talises far away from yourself, then unleash techniques at a distance. I call it remote invocation."
"You can also use them as a standard weapon to attack enemies a short distance away. They can be very useful."
"So, do Talises pique your interest? Then you might as well have this. It's an old one, but it's still in working order."
"There's no manual, but it's quicker to get a feel for it by using it yourself, anyway. Why don't you go give it a try?"
